function_call.name: eval_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":["Viral rna is not eliminated in the treated wastewater, indicating potential presence of contagious viruses.","Inability to detect infectious sars-cov-2 particles in the treated sewage despite the presence of viral rna fragments.","Higher sars-cov-2 rna copy number in solid-phase reservoir of wastewater samples","Presence of sars-cov-2-specific rna in untreated and treated wastewater samples","Variability in pcr measurements and storage conditions for rna extraction","Disturbing factors accumulated during sample processing that could influence analysis results","Estimation of covid-19 cases based on sewer network connections","The use of filtration equipment may not effectively remove all contaminants, including contagious disease particles.","Inaccurate quantification of endogenous parameters like creatinine and urea could lead to incorrect assessments of water quality and potential health risks.","The prevalence of reported covid-19 cases in the wwtp catchment area may indicate a higher risk of potential contamination in the water supply.","Exposure to wastewater samples during analysis","Handling and manipulation of chemical reagents and solvents","Isolation and use of hcov-229e in pcr","Sanger sequencing analysis","Replication studies with sars-cov-2 positive wastewater","Handling and manipulation of viral rna samples","Verification of specificity and sensitivity of rna sequencing","Handling and processing of contaminated wastewater samples may pose a risk of exposure to infectious viral rna.","Analysis of wastewater samples could potentially expose individuals to infectious viral material.","Variation in testing procedures and analysis methods for detecting coronavirus genetic material in environmental samples","Uncertainty about the distribution and survival of sars-cov-2 in the aquatic environment","Potential transmission of sars-cov-2 via feces in wastewater","Inaccurate estimation of infection spread in a population","Delayed detection of non-detected covid-19 cases","Transmission of contagious diseases through research activities"]}
